entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Func<T>.MakeGenericType(typeof(ReadOnlySpan<char>))` throws `ArgumentException` in 7.0.100-preview.4 while the exception was `TypeLoadException` in prior versions #69084
  • Perf: JIT sometimes does not elide duplicate checks across inlined methods #69080
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_DeserializeAsyncEnumerable.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable_ReadSimpleObjectAsync(count: 1000, bufferSize: 1) [FAIL] #69076
  • [QUIC] Don't use GetParam to get stream ID #69070
    7.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext accessing attribute on base type #69066
  • `LibraryImport` source generator test project fails to build in VS #69064
  • [API Proposal]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #69061
  • Revisit NonBacktracking's avoiding of findOptimizations.LeadingAnchor #69060
    7.0.0
  • Toolchain setup on contributing workflow could be updated for Linux #69058
  • JIT: Why increment so slow with others operations? #69055
  • .NET 7.0-preview3 Linux x64 stack overflow during GC under memory profiler (CRITICAL) #69052
  • The execution time is too long in Kubernetes #69050
  • SubjectName.Format displays in reverse #69049
    Future
  • HttpClient failed to handle Request Entity Too Large (413) response #69048
  • consolidate SslStream to single file #69045
    Future
  • Lock contention in SslStream.Encrypt/Decrypt #69042
  • Determine whether RegexOptions.NonBacktracking should capture all loop iterations #69040
    7.0.0
  • Finalize decision on RegexOptions.IgnoreCase case-equivalence function #69039
    7.0.0

Closed

  • .NET 7 regression in ZipArchive #68734
    7.0.0
  • [Mono JIT] Extend Linux perf jitdump functionality #36774
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGenerator crashes in IDE while editing GeneratedDllImport attribute #65008
    7.0.0
  • Add architectures supported by Mono but not supported by CoreCLR to System.Runtime.InteropServices.Architecture #26634
    Future
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : crash running JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b441487/b441487/b441487.sh #34383
    7.0.0
  • Running CoreCLR tests on Mono - Update the issues.target file with Git hub links as new issues are created for each failing excluded test #33258
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Merge TarEntry's DeviceMajor and DeviceMinor into a single API #68974
    7.0.0
  • Exception in chuncked response #68581
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in '<ToString_TestData>d__71:MoveNext():bool:this' during 'Do value numbering' (IL size 6679; hash 0x288e6df7; Tier1) #69047
  • Formatting jobs failing on Windows after native toolset upgrade #69053
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/VT/callconv/jumper5_il_r/jumper5_il_r.sh #66123
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 Android apps crash if trimmed #68987
    7.0.0
  • Application goes to break mode and pops up an exception when stop running application #69001
  • Any downside to getting the httpClient from the HttpClientFactory in Startup.cs? #68866
  • GetFileSystemEntries() causes each file to be stat'd even if the only thing we need are the paths #31301
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix namespace in error message #69083
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix incorrect none_no value when NUMA node is undefined in distribute_other_procs #69082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #69081
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • support only Ordinal comparison inside WildcardPathSegment #69079
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Remove coverlet.collector reference from LibraryImportGenerator tests #69078
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Avoid an assertion when cattrs with array parameters are const… #69077
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update ApiCompat.proj #69075
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update testPackages.proj #69074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Fix crash in `EvaluateOnCallFrameTests` on CI #69073
    arch-wasm, test-bug, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Define convention to include analyzers in ref pack #69069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with assert seen in OSR+PGO tests #69067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add option to set TLS cache size #69065
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Adjust the usage of ReverseEndianness in BinaryPrimitives #69063
    area-System.Buffers, optimization, community-contribution
  • [monoapi] Add MONO_IMAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED to MonoImageOpenStatus #69062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve BOL anchor handling with literal search #69059
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fold range checks with constant operands #69056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share code between source-generated and built-in marshallers #69043
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add the capability to walk up the inheritance chain for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69057
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono][arm64] Save the full 128 bit simd argument registers in the tr… #68997
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • `PUTARG_STK`/x86: mark `push [mem]` candidates reg optional #68641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • format correctly chuncked response with Content-Length header #69016
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Initialize "VNFuncApp.m_func" in "VNForBitCast" #69051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix formatting job on windows #69054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove an allocation during RSA key generation #69024
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: minor enhancement to jump threading #69022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Specify action permissions in cleanup task #69014
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix packs.product subset build with gcc #68998
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up specialized value num functions #69013
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • Reenable `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #68921
    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Allow some lazy loops to upgrade with auto-atomicity #68989
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc debugger improvements #68988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • StringMarshaller optimizations #69035
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68934
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PoC: retire internal SocketExceptionFactory #68918
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Handle case to update loop tables when preheader is removed #68803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement JsonContext and JsonTypeInfo Overloads for Binary Data #69012
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #68996
    area-Debugger-mono
  • "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop (#68288)" attempt no 2 #69009
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    area-System.Threading
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't return SslStreamBuffer when disposing during handshake #68956
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish Microsoft.NET.TestFramework to nuget.org. #25303
  • [API Compat] Provide a strict option for package-validation baseline checks #25302
  • NETSDK1152 Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web Library with package.lock.json during publishing #25294
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] All WPF apps launch failed with black screen or with exception about loading dlls #25289

Closed

  • .NET Core projects build with empty FrameworkDisplayName #10774
    Backlog
  • WarningLevel is no longer respected in .NET 5.0 #21599

PullRequests

Created

  • Move the publish task tests to helix including netfx run #25306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Aot, Trim and single file analyzers if PublishAot is set #25301
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Two more tests running on helix #25272
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25274
    Area-Infrastructure
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #24787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException from VisualBasic.Binder.ReportOverloadResolutionFailureForASingleCandidate #61193
  • [LSP] Re-enable LSP GoToDefinition + GoToImplementation integration tests #61188
  • ValueTrackingTree visual leaks WPF animation #61186
  • Fade-out of unused variables or parameters and dark theme #61185
  • `not` not appearing after `and`/`or` in pattern. #61184
  • "Add null check" quickfix should support generating ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull() calls #61181

Closed

  • Wrong compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initilizer #60960
    Compiler.Next
  • Escape characters on paste #31869
    17.3
  • Cleanup on save when fixing merge conflicts removes ALL usings #61159

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • test #61194
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Disable GoToDef/GoToImpl integration tests #61190
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, LSP
  • Avoid yield in ReadAsync/WriteAsync unless on main thread #61187
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Switch smart-copy-paste tests to use raw-string-literals. #61180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we do string-copy-paste before format-on-paste #61183
    Area-IDE, Next
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update file types reviewers #61192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • assert property is override when reporting `ERR_AutoPropertyMustOverrideSet` #61125
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • EnC: Implements support for changing namespace declarations #61176
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Analyzer Samples.md #51238
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE, Next
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for smart string/copy paste when the destination is a raw string literal. #61177
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Use auto-properties for PropertyOverrides #61107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Portable to 1.7.0-beta-21315-03 #54131
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.3
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect global:: for value tuples #41598
  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about boolean valued required key on header object of OpenAPI spec #41595
  • The openapi2client (Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi) complains about specification extensions at the path item object level of an OpenAPI spec #41593
  • OpenIdConnect: setting the ClaimsIssuer property in configuration options has no effect #41589
  • PageModel ValidationContext ObjectInstance missing property values #41582
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Doc misinformation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41284
    Backlog
  • Blazor project template - lower left nav can be inaccessible in short browser window #41050
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor Css Isolation Is Not Recognized in Maui-Blazor WinUI Application #41594
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41572
  • Java Client for SignalR - Invoking 'onClosed' method failed #41579
  • WebApplicationFactory<T>.CreateClient() fails when using app.Urls.Add() in minimal api. #39777
    7.0-preview5
  • BuilderRenderTree doesn't create "checked" attribute for input #41586
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run dotnet watch #41585
  • Microsoft.JSInterop can't build Release on Version 6.0.4 #41581
  • Target html and body tags in css isolated files #41580
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #41515
  • [Blazor] Remove some file in _content from publish #41551

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle unexpected errors #41597
    area-runtime
  • Merge HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request cookies on Kestrel #41591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Merged

  • Pass through CancellationToken #41531
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Revert "Use 1es-windows-2019 again" #41590
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix documentation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41565
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix selenium-standalone invocation #41592
    7.0-preview5
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 7.0-preview5
  • Bump SDK to latest nightly #41588
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41460
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `4348d4e` #41583
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Add a no-op IServerAddressesFeature implementation to TestServer.Features #41570
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Introduce a new FlyoutDisplayOptions on Shell "DisplayAsChildren" #6973
  • Redundant/incorrect Style definition for SearchHandler in MAUI boilerplate #6972
    6.0.300
  • Application.ModalPopped never fires when run in Unit Test. #6971
  • Blazor MAUI dynamic root components fail on iOS hardware #6965
    6.0.300
  • Show platform UI for alert/prompt in webviews #6963
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Changing ImageSource in MAUI app causes flicker on Windows #6962
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Alerts in Blazor and WebView on Windows do not look nice #6961
  • [ANDROID] ScrollView not increasing in height when its child ListView or CollectionView are getting more items #6959
  • Slider value property is ignored on initialization #6957
  • Offering help porting the Xamarin.forms tutorial over to .NET MAUI #6954
  • Can we create a MAUI tutorial based on the Contoso University example? #6952
  • Horizontal layout position not updated correctly while dynamically updated in windows platform #6946
  • ContentPropertyAttribute not working like Xamarin/WPF #6944
    6.0.300
  • ListView not scrolling, not selecting after update, extremely slow to update #6943
    6.0.300

Closed

  • Remove Debug.Asserts Added from this PR #6616
    6.0.300
  • Missing TextColor in MenuBar #5554
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] ContentView with ContentPresenter measured and arranged incorrectly #6808
    6.0.300
  • Shell.TitleColor is dark on top level FlyoutItem but white on secondary page #5757
    6.0.300
  • QueryProperty is not set when navigating back to page. #6698
    6.0.300
  • Can't start Blazor MAUI project rc2 #6867
  • Is there a prescribed way to include generated content files as static assets? #6904
  • Resources path in Maui should always use / and not the escape character \ which is Windows only #6926
  • SQL Server pre-login handshake failed Android 5,6,8.1 #6859
  • [Bug] Cursor Position wrong in Entry field when using IValueConverter #6948
    6.0.300
  • wrong splash screen shown under Android 12 (API 31), but is correct with Android 11 #6937
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] CollectionView.EmptyView does not raises clicked event on UWP #3013
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems are disappearing when navigating back from an another page #6855
    6.0.300-servicing
  • `ListView` uses the wrong style in WinUI 3 #6209
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CollectionView on Android does not show new objects if it starts with 0 objects #6386
    6.0.300
  • Icon on Alt-Tab not showing on Windows #5915
    6.0.300
  • Items do not render in CollectionView after scrolling when wrapped in ContentView #5248
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView SelectedItem not highlighted on Android until scroll #5117
    6.0.300
  • Shell Navigation with Models #6935
    Future
  • [Bug] Grid inside a StackLayout with Padding, exceeds view limit. #6451
    6.0.300
  • Grid Layout children are being clipped in Android #4011
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView taps not being processed #6075
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] ContentView not rendering until resize Window #3462
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Set WinUI picker description to title #6970
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fix sandbox project #6968
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix WinUI fully templated RadioButton #6967
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300
  • Fix Maui.Controls.Sample Blazor dynamic root components trimming problem. #6966
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Move loose resource items under a folder #6956
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Respect BarTextColor in Windows MenuBar #6964
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, 6.0.300

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to load vfs extensions in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #27986
  • How to specify which SQL Server DbContext constructor to use in ASP.NET Core dependency injection? #27982

Closed

  • Runtime error on string.StartsWith, string.EndsWith string.Contains in lambda search filter with StringComparison #27983
  • migration " ConcurrencyToken" every time #27908

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.26.1 to 3.27.0 #27987
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Remove Convert node when up-casting to an interface #27964
    waiting-for-response
  • Query: Introduce EnumerableExpression which is not SQL token #27969
  • Respect EvaluatableExpressionFilter in RelationalSqlTranslatingEV #27965
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
